{{disambig-more|Rivendell|[[Rivendell (disambiguation)]]}}
'''Rivendell''' is an epic black metal band with folk infuences, formed in Austria in [[1998]]. The current line-up is only one man, "Falagar" (Gerold Laimer). Rivendell has released three albums:
* [[2000]]: "The Ancient Glory"
* [[2003]]: "Elven Tears"
* [[2005]]: "Farewell-The Last Dawn"
